actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction for State or local taxes imposed on the rental of dwelling units.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a tax deduction for State and local taxes paid or incurred for the rental of a dwelling unit. States that for purposes of this Act the term "dwelling unit" means a housing unit occupied by a tenant as a principal residence, and excludes a facility (such as a hotel or motel room) which is occupied by a transient on a short-term or temporary basis.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction for State or local taxes imposed on the rental of dwelling units.
